message: NullPointerException fixed.

Replace a NullPointerException with one explaining that the ServiceComposite type has not been declared.
Adding more tests around Configuration constraint validation.

Signed-off-by: niclas <niclas@hedhman.org>

+package org.apache.polygene.api.configuration;
+
+import org.apache.polygene.api.structure.ModuleDescriptor;
+
+public class NoSuchConfigurationTypeException extends RuntimeException
+{
+    private final Class<?> configType;
+
+    public NoSuchConfigurationTypeException( Class<?> configType,
+                                             ModuleDescriptor module
+                                           )
+    {
+        super( "No configuration type " + configType.getName() + " has been registered, or is not visible from " + module.name() );
+        this.configType = configType;
+    }
+}

NullPointerException when visitModel and no parameterInjections

o Fixed bug. 
  Invoking xxx.toString() was caused a NullPointerException.



git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/core@8653 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd
Fixed CleanStackTraceTest and a NPE in ModuleInstance

NullPointerException when accessing the store, changed to call the lazy init method

git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/core@11954 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd

Merge pull request #3 from eskatos/Applying_1.4_to_develop

Fixed CleanStackTraceTest and a NPE in ModuleInstance

o Overriding visitProperties() in EntityPropertiesInstance, as otherwise a NPE results when visiting the StateHolder of an entity.
o Removing unnecessary method parameters (identity), since EntityState contains the identity.

Applied patch for QI-41 (NPE in EntityCompositeInstance)

git-svn-id: https://scm.ops4j.org/repos/ops4j/projects/qi4j/libraries@8992 9b982a3c-3ae5-0310-a4bc-d9a3335569bd

Fixed a bug with optional number properties and preferences entity store.

It was because propertyTypeDescriptor.initialValue() was passed onto, for example, Preferences.getInt(String, int), which caused NullPointerException to be thrown if initialValue() returned null (since null can't be casted into int).

Do not initialize Property<Collection<X>> as il looks like is not yet working.
Resolve NPE in teatrDown() if exception in setup().

message:
o Modularizing the RDF Indexer so we can have persisted and remote repositories.
o Added some more descriptive Exceptions for non-registered Composites/Entities/Services. Also, found one case where the UOW would throw a NPE instead of reporting a missing registration.
